text: Arau sihamta sakalorae allahara ocarata prakasita ha’ba. Tetiya durbalasakale yisakale ahankara karaichila sihamtaka ka’ba, ‘ami tomalokara anusarai achilo, etiya tomaloke allahara sastira paraa amaka alapa raksa karaiba paraibane’? Sihamte ka’ba, ‘allahe yadi amaka satpathata paraicalita karailehemtena tente ami'o tomalokaka satpathata paraicalita karailohemtena. Etiya ami dhairyacyuta ha'om athaba dhairyasila- ubhaya arastha'i amara babe samana; amara paloraara kono tha'i na'i’
